query: Get me the most loyal customers who have placed at least two orders
description: Show me a list of customers with their first order date, last order date, and order count, along with any additional information from the merged shop data, for customers who have made 2 or more orders.

graph.description: filtered table of all our top and most loyal customers at least N orders
graph.name: loyalty

graph.description: merged summary table of orders grouped by customer
graph.name: merge

sql:
select * from `dbt-tutorial`.jaffle_shop.customers
select * from `dbt-tutorial`.jaffle_shop.orders
with
    customers as (
        select id as customer_id, first_name, last_name from `helical-math-378821`.`shop`.`customers`
    ),
    orders as (
        select id as order_id, user_id as customer_id, order_date, status
        from `helical-math-378821`.`shop`.`orders`
    ),
    customer_orders as (
        select
            customer_id,
            min(order_date) as first_order_date,
            max(order_date) as last_order_date,
            count(order_id) as order_count
        from orders
        group by 1
    ),
    final as (
        select
            customers.customer_id,
            customers.first_name,
            customers.last_name,
            customer_orders.first_order_date,
            customer_orders.last_order_date,
            coalesce(customer_orders.order_count, 0) as order_count
        from customers
        left join customer_orders using (customer_id)
    )
select *
from final
select * from `helical-math-378821`.`shop`.`merge`
where order_count >= 2.0

description: Show the most recent 100 orders placed in the shop.

graph.description: filtered table of our latest or most recent orders
graph.name: latest

sql:
select * from `dbt-tutorial`.jaffle_shop.orders
select * from `helical-math-378821`.`shop`.`orders`
order by order_date desc
limit 100

query: Please get all stripe payments data
description: Retrieve all information related to payments from the database for analysis.
Show a list of the top 20 payments across all transactions, sorted by the payment amount, from different database schemas.

graph.description: filtered table of our largest payments or biggest or most expensive orders
graph.name: biggest

sql:
select * from `dbt-tutorial`.stripe.payment
select * from `helical-math-378821`.`shop`.`payments`
order by amount desc
limit 20

query: Find the fifty most expensive orders
description: Show me the details of the top 50 largest payment transactions across various payment methods and retail locations.

graph.description: filtered table of our largest payments or biggest or most expensive orders
graph.name: biggest

sql:
select * from `dbt-tutorial`.stripe.payment
select * from `helical-math-378821`.`shop`.`payments`
order by amount desc
limit 50

query: List of football players who win matches consecutively in the past year.
description: Show all payment details from both the Stripe and shop databases, ordered by the payment amount in descending order, starting from the beginning.

graph.description: filtered table of our largest payments or biggest or most expensive orders
graph.name: biggest

sql:
select * from `dbt-tutorial`.stripe.payment
select * from `helical-math-378821`.`shop`.`payments`
order by amount desc
limit 0

query: Get me some trending products from this month and past month
description: Show all payment information, organized by the payment with the highest amount, from two different databases, including the payment amount, customer details, and transaction date.

graph.description: filtered table of our largest payments or biggest or most expensive orders
graph.name: biggest

sql:
select * from `dbt-tutorial`.stripe.payment
select * from `helical-math-378821`.`shop`.`payments`
order by amount desc
limit 0

description: Show me a list of customers with their first order date, last order date, and order count, along with any additional information from the merged shop data, for customers who have made 5 or more orders.

graph.description: filtered table of all our top and most loyal customers at least N orders
graph.name: loyalty

graph.description: merged summary table of orders grouped by customer
graph.name: merge

sql:
select * from `dbt-tutorial`.jaffle_shop.customers
select * from `dbt-tutorial`.jaffle_shop.orders
with
    customers as (
        select id as customer_id, first_name, last_name from `helical-math-378821`.`shop`.`customers`
    ),
    orders as (
        select id as order_id, user_id as customer_id, order_date, status
        from `helical-math-378821`.`shop`.`orders`
    ),
    customer_orders as (
        select
            customer_id,
            min(order_date) as first_order_date,
            max(order_date) as last_order_date,
            count(order_id) as order_count
        from orders
        group by 1
    ),
    final as (
        select
            customers.customer_id,
            customers.first_name,
            customers.last_name,
            customer_orders.first_order_date,
            customer_orders.last_order_date,
            coalesce(customer_orders.order_count, 0) as order_count
        from customers
        left join customer_orders using (customer_id)
    )
select *
from final
select * from `helical-math-378821`.`shop`.`merge`
where order_count >= 5.0
